title: Could someone shed some light on why I might be lagging?
body:
Take today as an example
Play two games. 
First one, not a second of lag, second game I freeze every time I use an ability.

For both games I had a steady 60 fps and 50-ish ping. There was no one else home, no other gadgets connected to the net, nothing else downloading, no other apps open on my computer and it's a one year old $3000 laptop so that's most likely not it. 

Happens often where I'll play one or two smooth games and it'll just lag like hell for the next one.

y

xD hhahahah lol post that to redit l3l!!!

Yeah I get this sometimes, one game is fine the next I will just lag out at about 5 - 10 mins into the game and either never reconnect or reconnect at over 1k ping then get disconnected again and again. All I can do to solve this is pray to god my luck is good.
